snippet: A state park agency has approved a sprawling resort project that could help revive the limping economy of Tupper Lake. Environmentalists fear that it will set a dangerous precedent and jeopardize the area's natural riches.
abstract: A state park agency has approved a sprawling resort project that could help revive the limping economy of Tupper Lake. Environmentalists fear that it will set a dangerous precedent and jeopardize the area's natural riches.

headline.main: Debating a Resort for the Adirondacks
